explains: adj. （尤指小孩）惯坏的，宠坏的；（食物）不可食用的
v. 破坏，糟蹋；溺爱，宠坏；善待，格外关照（spoil 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: She is perceived as vain, spoiled, and promiscuous.
sentences.cn: 她被认为是个虚荣、娇生惯养、淫乱的女人。

sentences.en: He spoiled my enjoyment of the game by talking all through it.
sentences.cn: 他一直在讲话，破坏了我看比赛的兴致。

sentences.en: He really spoiled me on my birthday.
sentences.cn: 我过生日那天他真让我受宠若惊。
